item.title: Bryce add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "If you go home with somebody, and they don't have books, don't fuck 'em!" -- John Waters

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "I want to stand as close to the edge as I can without going over. Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can't see from the center." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "My experience of life is that it is not divided up into genres; itâ€™s a horrifying, romantic, tragic, comical, science-fiction cowboy detective novel. You know, with a bit of pornography if you're lucky." -- Alan Moore

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "When did the future switch from being a promise to being a threat?" -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "We all die. The goal isn't to live forever, the goal is to create something that will." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Lloyd Alexander
item.description: "Most of us are called on to perform tasks far beyond what we can do. Our capabilities seldom match our aspirations, and we are often woefully unprepared. To this extent, we are all Assistant Pig-Keepers at heart." -- Lloyd Alexander

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Jim Thompson
item.description: "Life is a bucket of shit with a barbed wire handle." -- Jim Thompson

item.title: Bryce add a quote by Dennis Lehane
item.description: "What molds us is what maims us." -- Dennis Lehane
